item.title: Healer Resources
item.description: Job Resources Sage Scholar Astrologian White Mage General Resources

item.title: Sage
item.description: Openers In both of the below openers, any Dosis III can be replaced with Toxicon II. I tend to shield pre-pull and then use Toxicon II directly before the first Phlegma III because I like the sound it makes when you get an Addersting stack.
